commit message:
strings.xml in french

Hi,

Please find here the strings.xml file translated in french.
Update strings.xml

Merge pull request #31 from Choukajohn/patch-1

strings.xml in french
Properly terminate the french string xml
WIP: appcompat 22.1
More work on using support v22.1

WIP v22.1

Fix the action mode default button colors
Use v22.1 dialogs

Some work on issue #30

The session settings, settings and about are now static.
The directory list is currently broken.

Fixes #30

Fix the directory list items
Get the fresh item position when an item is clicked. The one passed
during binding may not be valid (mostly when a profiles have been
expanded).
fix entry padding issues on pre v21 devices
safely remove the tracker view from the list

update the test infrastructure

setup for gradle plugin 1.2 and robolectric 3
fix some incorrect tests

Per-profile toolbar color

WIP for easier distinguishing between profiles
Add the profile colors to the profile selector
use darker colors

use a custom stroke color for the default one

makes it stand out when positioned on a background with the same color
as itself
Restore the saved color on activity resume
Make sure no errors from previous profiles creep into the current one
Use a color array
use the same height for the toolbar and the action mode
make the alt speed switch active track white
show the profile colors in the profile list of the settings

Cleanup the profile preferences

Stop supporting the legacy profile preferences
Do not use unprefixed profile preference keys
Discard the 'save' button in the profile preference screen,
leaving it to act as any other preference screen.

TODO: need to validate that important profile fields aren't left blank.

Improve profile preference handling

validate some profile preference values
add new profiles to the profile list
ignore invalid profiles in the sidebar dropdown
show invalid ones in the settings

Improve profile preferences

Disallow 'example.com' as a valid hostname

Upgrade the version checker to handle -beta and -rc suffixes

++version
